text.healthmod.band_aid.3: You have a 25% chance of getting an infection.
text.healthmod.band_aid.failed_apply: Uh oh, you didn't put the band aid on correctly!
text.healthmod.antibiotics.resistant_bac: Uh oh, the bacteria has become resistant!
text.autoconfig.healthmod.title: HealthMod Config
text.autoconfig.healthmod.option.bacteri: Chance for antibiotics to fail and make harmful effects stronger (1/config value)
text.autoconfig.healthmod.option.bandAid: Chance for band aids to fail and give you a wound infection (1/config value)
Chance for band aids to fail and give you a wound infection when healthy (1/config value)
text.autoconfig.healthmod.option.damaged: Chance for you to get a wound infection when damaged by 2 or more (1/config value)
Chance for you to get a wound infection when healthy and damaged by 2 or more (1/config value)
